thread.title: Chris Smalling to leave Manchester United for Arsenal? Transfer news and gossip from Sunday's papers
thread.title_full: Chris Smalling to leave Manchester United for Arsenal? Transfer news and gossip from Sunday's papers

author: Football Spy
title: Chris Smalling to leave Manchester United for Arsenal? Transfer news and gossip from Sunday's papers
text:
Chris Smalling to leave Manchester United for Arsenal? Transfer news and gossip from Sunday's papers PLUS: West Ham could move for Southampton's Shane Long Share Chris Smalling could leave Old Trafford (Photo: Matthew Peters) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Arsenal could be ready to pounce for Manchester United defender Chris Smalling if he is deemed surplus to requirements at Old Trafford. 
Smalling is set to be the fall guy if United complete the signing of Swedish defender VIctor Lindelof from Benfica. 
And according to the Daily Star , the Gunners would be interested in the Englishman, although Arsene Wenger would likely have competition from Everton. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
